repairedDockerfile:
FROM centos:7

#
# UTF-8 by default
#
ENV LANG en_US.UTF-8
ENV LANGUAGE en_US:en
ENV LC_ALL en_US.UTF-8

#
# Pull Zulu OpenJDK binaries from official repository:
#
RUN rpm --import http://repos.azulsystems.com/RPM-GPG-KEY-azulsystems
RUN curl -f -o /etc/yum.repos.d/zulu.repo https://repos.azulsystems.com/rhel/zulu.repo
RUN yum -q -y update
RUN yum -q -y install zulu-11 && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
